Using 0.8.1-SNAPSHOT <denchmark-h:h3>Solution</denchmark-h>
Solved by changing from .workerPrefetchNumBatches(2) to .workerPrefetchNumBatches(0)

comments.comment: hypothetically fixed, please check after snapshot is recompiled

Yeah looks good. Thanks so much! <denchmark-link:#>…</denchmark-link>
